name: tissue paper production, virgin | tissue paper | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2175/documentation

This dataset is based on the Best Available Techniques (BAT) Reference Document for in the Production of Pulp, Paper and Board (May 2012). It may not in all aspects fulfill the requirements of the ecoinvent data quality guideline for version 3.

from receipt of market pulp at the paper mill

to the output of paper at the paper mill
category: C:Manufacturing/17:Manufacture of paper and paper products/170:Manufacture of paper and paper products/1701:Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: These data is sourced from Table 7.4 of the draft report of Best Available Techniques (BAT) Reference Document for in the Production of Pulp, Paper and Board (May 2012) referring to an original source "ETS 1998" which is not listed in the list of references.
